original: 琅琊臨沂人，東晉官員，權臣王敦的兄長。因王含支持王敦，在王敦之亂期間身居高位。其人愚昧暴戾，貪婪無道，為時人所不齒。
text: Langya Linyi, an official of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, the elder brother of the power official Wang Dun. Because Wang Han supported Wang Dun, he held a high position during the Wang Dun Rebellion. His people were ignorant and violent, greedy and innocent, and were despised by the time.
